00008 #define UART_BUFFER_SIZE        255             /* uart buffer size */
00009 #define STR_NUMBER                       4              /* string number */
00010 
00011 #define CMD_POB         "POB"           /* simple test */
00012 #define CMD_RGB         "RGB"           /* grab a rgb frame */
00013 #define CMD_COMPRESS    "COMPRESS"      /* compress frame component, parameters: ON/OFF */
00014 #define CMD_SEND                "SEND"          /* send frame, parameters: RED/GREEN/BLUE/HUE/SATURATION/LIGHT */
00015 #define CMD_RUN         "RUN"           /* pob-bot run */
00016 #define CMD_BACK                "BACK"          /* pob-bot back */
00017 #define CMD_LEFT                "LEFT"          /* pob-bot left */
00018 #define CMD_RIGHT               "RIGHT"         /* pob-bot right */
00019 #define CMD_STOP                "STOP"          /* pob-bot stop */
00020 #define CMD_SERVO               "SERVO"         /* set servomotor position, parameters: servo_value position_value */
00021 #define CMD_LCD         "LCD"           /* draw camera frame, parameters: ON */
00022 
00023 
00024 #define OK                      "OK"                    /* last operation successfull */
00025 #define NOK                     "!OK"
00026 
00027 #define ON                      "ON"
00028 #define OFF                     "OFF"
00029 
00030 //pob-proto init
00031 static UInt8 pobProtoOk=0;
00032 static void InitPobProto (void);

00034 //pob-bot movement
00035 #define MOVE_RUN                0x05
00036 #define MOVE_BACK               0x0A
00037 #define MOVE_LEFT               0x09
00038 #define MOVE_RIGHT              0x06
00039 #define STOP_BOT                0

00051 //lcd fast buffer video
00052 static UInt8 LCD_Fast_Buffer[64*64*BYTES];
00053 static GraphicBuffer LCD_Fast_Buffer_Video;

00055 int main(void)
00056 {
00057         UInt32 i,j;
00058 
00059         UInt32 time0,time1;
00060 
00061         Int32 cnt=0;
00062 
00063         UInt8 *ptr =0;
00064         int wh = 160*120;
00065 
00066         UInt8 green[160*120];
00067         UInt8 blue[160*120];
00068 
00069         UInt8 uartBufferSize=UART_BUFFER_SIZE;  //uart buffer size
00070         UInt8 uartBuffer[UART_BUFFER_SIZE];             //uart buffer
00071         UInt8 uartSize;                                                 //number of byte receive from uart
00072 
00073         UInt8 stringMax=STR_NUMBER;     //string buffer size
00074         Int8 stringNumber=0;            //number of string in buffer
00075         String string[STR_NUMBER];      //string buffer
00076 
00077         int servo,position,temp;
00078 
00079         UInt8 *FrameFromCam;
00080         UInt8 PrintFrameOnLcd = 0;
00081 
00082         InitPobeye2();
00083         InitPobProto();
00084         InitUART0(115200);
00085         InitI2C(I2C_100_KHZ);
00086 
00087         SendString("Init pobeye2 uart/i2c ok\r\n");
00088 
00089         InitCameraPobeye2();
00090 
00091         SendString("Init pobeye2 camera ok\r\n");
00092 
00093         FrameFromCam = GetRGBFrame();
00094 
00095         while(1)
00096         {
00097                 //receive user command
00098                 uartSize=receive(uartBuffer,uartBufferSize);
00099 
00100                 //extract the user command and parameters from the uart buffer
00101                 stringNumber=extractString(string,stringMax,uartBuffer,uartSize);
00102 
00103                 //command switch:
00104 
00105                 if(strCmp(CMD_POB,string[0].buffer,string[0].len)==1)
00106                 {
00107                         //simple test
00108                         send(OK);
00109                 }
00110                 else if(strCmp(CMD_RGB,string[0].buffer,string[0].len)==1)
00111                 {
00112                         //grab a frame from camera sensor
00113                         GrabRGBFrame();
00114                         //GrabFullRGBFrame(green,blue);
00115                         
00116                         cnt=0;
00117                         send(OK);
00118                 }
00119                 else if(strCmp(CMD_RUN,string[0].buffer,string[0].len)==1)
00120                 {
00121                         MoveBot(MOVE_RUN);
00122                         send(OK);
00123                 }
00124                 else if(strCmp(CMD_LEFT,string[0].buffer,string[0].len)==1)
00125                 {
00126                         MoveBot(MOVE_LEFT);
00127                         send(OK);
00128                 }
00129                 else if(strCmp(CMD_RIGHT,string[0].buffer,string[0].len)==1)
00130                 {
00131                         MoveBot(MOVE_RIGHT);
00132                         send(OK);
00133                 }
00134                 else if(strCmp(CMD_BACK,string[0].buffer,string[0].len)==1)
00135                 {
00136                         MoveBot(MOVE_BACK);
00137                         send(OK);
00138                 }
00139                 else if(strCmp(CMD_STOP,string[0].buffer,string[0].len)==1)
00140                 {
00141                         MoveBot(STOP_BOT);
00142                         send(OK);
00143                 }
00144                 else if(strCmp(CMD_COMPRESS,string[0].buffer,string[0].len)==1)
00145                 {
00146                         send(OK);
00147                 }
00148                 else if(strCmp(CMD_SERVO,string[0].buffer,string[0].len)==1)
00149                 {       
00150                         if(stringNumber==3)
00151                         {
00152                                 //get servo and position
00153                                 servo=(UInt8)strtol((const char*)string[1].buffer,(char **)'\0',10);
00154                                 position=(UInt8)strtol((const char*)string[2].buffer,(char **)'\0',10);
00155 
00156                                 //set servo
00157                                 SetServoRgb(servo, position);
00158 
00159                                 send(OK);
00160                         }
00161                         else
00162                         {
00163                                 send(NOK);
00164                         }
00165                 }
00166                 else if(strCmp(CMD_LCD,string[0].buffer,string[0].len)==1)
00167                 {
00168                         //init the pob-lcd
00169                         InitLCD(); 
00170                         //init the graphic buffer video: 64 x 64 pixels
00171                         InitGraphicBuffer(&LCD_Fast_Buffer_Video,64,64,EIGHT_BITS,LCD_Fast_Buffer);
00172                         //clear graphic buffer
00173                         ClearGraphicBuffer(&LCD_Fast_Buffer_Video);
00174                         while (GetByteFromUART0NoWait(&PrintFrameOnLcd)==0) 
00175                         {
00176                                 GrabRGBFrame();                                 //get a new Frame from the cmos sensor
00177                                 BinaryRGBFrame(FrameFromCam);   
00178                                 DrawVision(FrameFromCam);
00179                         }
00180                         send(OK);
00181                 }
00182                 else if(strCmp(CMD_SEND,string[0].buffer,string[0].len)==1)
00183                 {
00184 
00185                         if(cnt==0)
00186                         {
00187                                 ptr = GetRGBFrame();
00188                         //      GetHSLFrame(ptr);
00189                         //      GetHSVFrame(ptr);
00190 
00191                                 //GrayRGBFrame(ptr);
00192                                 //BinaryRGBFrame(ptr);
00193         
00194                                 cnt=1;
00195                         }
00196                         else if(cnt==1)
00197                         {
00198                                 ptr= green;//GetRgbFrame();
00199                                 cnt=2;
00200                         }
00201                         else if(cnt==2)
00202                         {
00203                                 ptr=blue; //GetRgbFrame();
00204                         }
00205 
00206                 //      ptr = GetRed();
00207 
00208                         for (i=0,j=0; i < wh ; i++,j++)
00209                         {
00210                                 SendByteToUART0( ptr[i] );
00211                 
00212                                 //pob-eye crash if you send to many byte
00213 
00214                                 if(j==255)
00215                                 {
00216                                         j=0;
00217                                         GetByteFromUART0();
00218                                 }
00219                         }
00220 
00221                         send(OK);
00222                 }
00223                 else
00224                 {
00225                         send(NOK);
00226                 }
00227         }
00228 
00229 
00230         return 0;
00231 }
00232 
00233 //Function to initialize the POB-PROTO board
00234 void InitPobProto (void)
00235 {
00236         PobProto        Proto; // struct to set the pob-proto
00237         
00238         Proto.porta=ALL_PORTA_AS_ANA;   //to get the position of the analogic joystick, you have to set the PORTA as analogic input
00239         Proto.portc=RC7_AS_SERVO        | RC6_AS_SERVO |RC3_AS_SERVO |RC2_AS_SERVO|RC1_AS_SERVO |RC0_AS_SERVO;  //all pin of PORTC are configured to manage servomotors
00240         Proto.portd=RD7_AS_DI   | RD6_AS_DI     |RD5_AS_DI |RD4_AS_DI|RD3_AS_DO |RD2_AS_DO      |RD1_AS_DO      |RD0_AS_DO;             //RD0 RD1 RD2 RD3 are configured as digitals output to gear DC motor, RD4 RD5 RD6 RD7 are configured as digitals input
00241         SetPobProto(&Proto);    //set the pob proto
00242 }
00243 
00244 
00245 //function to move the bot
00246 void MoveBot (UInt8 Way)
00247 {       
00248         if(pobProtoOk==0)
00249         {
00250                 InitPobProto();
00251                 SwitchOnAllServo();
00252                 pobProtoOk=1;
00253         }
00254 
00255         SetPortD(Way);
00256 }
00257 
00258 
00259 //set servo
00260 void SetServoRgb(UInt8 servo, UInt8 position)
00261 {
00262         if(pobProtoOk==0)
00263         {
00264                 InitPobProto();
00265                 SwitchOnAllServo();
00266                 pobProtoOk=1;
00267         }
00268 
00269 
00270         if(position==4||position==5)
00271         {
00272                 SetServoMotor(servo,position+2);
00273         }
00274         else
00275         {
00276                 SetServoMotor(servo,position);
00277         }
00278 }
00279 
00280 void DrawVision (UInt8 *FrameFromCam)
00281 {       
00282         //draw the red buffer (88*120 pixels) on the Buffer for for the left screen (64*64 pixels)
00283         DrawComponentInABufferVideo(FrameFromCam,&LCD_Fast_Buffer_Video);
00284         DrawLeftLCD(&LCD_Fast_Buffer_Video); //refresh the left screen
00285 }
